title: Victorian Pontypool
description: A journey through the Victorian era of Pontypool using newspaper articles of the past. It is a fascinating glimpse into a world long gone, whether you are familiar with Pontypool or not. The book records the lives of the people who lived in the town and neighbouring villages, their daily struggles with poverty, disease and disaster but also looks at the happy times and the amusing parts of Victorian life.
author: Carol Ann Lewis
